values: hey everyone.... how are you? me im fine.. not in a good mood at all... but its not like anyone cares..... well i know a few ppl care... im so bored my friend doug is ganna come and get me and we are ganna go do something... wat i dont kno yet.... but wat can i say.. i have a few friends that really care.... now if i had my car everyone would start callin me up again and wanting me to take them places... but guess wat they aint got money then they aint goin... well keriann can call me and i would go get her... she was been there for me... we had our ups and downs but... who doesnt?? of well i have to get ready... i will ttyl happy firecracker day! lol xoxo muahz everyone

hey everyone.. i have a very good week.... lol... but this weekend comin up is ganna be crazy... i have a wedding on fri. and sat... and then fathers day sunday... JOY!  lol.. naw im ganna have lots of fun.... but im tried and ready to watch a movie or movies and then go to bed... so i will ttyl.. xoxo muah

ok.. now my grandpa is goin to move up here... he was ganna be here yesterday... but his car broke down on the way.. so my dad and a friend of the family went to go pick my grandpa up... i had two bedrooms but now i have one... witch is cool with me... my mom is so happy that he is move back in with us... he lived with us in miami and then when we moved up here where i live now, he went and lived in orlando this is son (my uncle)... well that house is fallin apart... but i guess no one cares... i kno my cuz's dont... so that dont help... maybe if they were ok with everything and stop bein rude and callin our family asshole's and everything else and stop and think how much my uncle did for them, then maybe they wouldnt be like that... BUT i doubt that... my cuz amanda got her head so far up her ass that it aint even funny... she just wants her way.. she wants to be with her LOSER boyfriend... i wanna beat his ass... and my aunt favors her other duaghter krista... krista gets wat ever she wants... they pay more attenion to krista then amanda and is has always been that way... maybe if they pay attenion to amanda then she would leave that asshole... instead of calling the family an asshole... everone in the family was good to those grls... but they are NOT greatful for it... they didnt have moch with my uncle and my aunt got married.. and my uncle said he would do anything to give them a better life... yeah my uncle can get upset at times... but the grls dont help... im sorry but if your infront of your parents with your boyfriend, you DONT be all over eachother... its not right... thats rude... but like i said krista can do watever she wants... but watever... if those where my sisters and they didnt have respect for our parents then we would be outside fighting... bc you dont disrespect your parents... but anywayz my dad and my grandpa and our friend mr. joel our on there way back.. they should be here in like 2 hours... so i have to go... im ganna watch a movie until they get here... ttyl xoxo muah bye

ok.. sunday was so bad... me and this kid were like talkin and he invited me to go campin with and his friends.. so i said ok... not knowin anyone but him... so we go campin everything is cool on the way there... i guess bc i told him that if he was only bring me campin so he could get some then bring me home bc he wasnt ganna get any!!! and he was like no it aint like that... well let me tell you... he was pissed bc i wouldnt give him any.. so he starts callin me a bitch and everything else.. his friend corey was like why are you being rude to her she is a female you dont be like that to grls and so on and so on... so then the kid i was talkin to left me out in the woods where we were campin at... i had no clue where i was.... thank god for cell phones.. but yeah.. he is ganna get his... well g2g ttyl.. xoxo muah

this week was so much fun.. i went to miami and then i went to orlando... we went to the beach and at a party at the house... man did i get a tan... my cuz got a battle scar from the beach.. but we had a blast... i cant wait to go home and have my bed back.. see ya next time
